name: The Warehouse (itch)
description:
| PITCH

You're the janitor of a warehouse. Some lamps need fixing, unfortunately there are no ladders, so you need to use boxes, planks and cushions to get to the top.

| WARNINGS

_This game is in German. You don't need to understand the text though.

| CONTROLLS

[WASD]   Move
[Space]   Jump
[Mouse]   View
[LMB]   Place/Throw
[RMB]   Pick Up
[F], [K]   Switch Tool
